name: XeroDunes
description:
This one was fully created by "GamerKing64". After a long time spent learning the structure of KDE Plasma this rice was born. We are very proud of him for graduating to full-time ricer status.

it's very light on resources, your machine will fly ! We have opted to use the Dracula Theme this time around, as it looks so clean and is easy on the eyes. We hope you like it... ðŸ˜‰"

name: XeroCherry
description:
This is one of our favourite Rices. Proudly created by 2 guys from Lebanon, me and "GamerKing64". We are very proud of this one as it is the lightest yet.

it's so light on resources, your machine will fly ! we love the color scheme used. credit to NullXception for creating such an awesome theme for us to use.. We hope you like it too ðŸ˜‰"

name: XeroLayan
description:
This rice was the main one used on Xero for a while, uses Latte for both Panels & Dock. It is intended to be mainly used on XeroLinux.

Test it out and let me know...

name: XeroNord
description: This is where XeroNord Grub Theme will be. Constantly updated so keep coming back. I included a script that makes installing much easier, just follow steps below :

name: XeroSweet
description: This rice is super simple, based on the SweetKDE theme with Candy Icons, not very complex easy on resources. It is intended to be mainly used on XeroLinux. Have fun.
